text: Dawid san dii Moabfo8.2 Na Moabfo no yɛ Lot asefo (1 Mose 19.37) a wɔtenaa Nkyene Po no apuei fam. Saa bere no na Saulo adi wɔn so dedaw (1 Sam 14.47). Bere a Dawid wɔ asutwa mu no, ɔmaa nʼabusuafo kɔtenaa Moab (1 Sam 22.3-4). Dawid agyanom fi Moab (Rut 1.22; 4.22). so. Ɔmaa nnipa no dedaa fam, na ɔde hama susuw wɔn. Osusuw hama no abien a, na wakyerɛ sɛ wonkum saa nnipa no. Ɛnna osusuw hama no baako a, na wakyerɛ sɛ wonnyaa saa nkurɔfo no. Enti Moabfo a wonyaa wɔn ti didii mu no bɛyɛɛ Dawid asomfo a na afe biara woyi tow brɛ no.
